permissions.cannot_send_messages: I do not have the correct permission to send messages in this channel!
permissions.cannot_send_messages_in_threads: I do not have the correct permission to send messages in threads!

suggestions.not_found: Couldn't find that suggestion in the cache! Please try again later!
suggestions.filtered_none_found: No suggestions found matching that filter!
suggestions.user_deleted_post: The original message for this suggestion was deleted!

repository.save_error: An error occurred while saving the repository: %s
repository.load_error: An error occurred while loading the repository: %s
repository.stats_error: An error occurred while getting the statistics for that repository: %s

commands.only_available_in_threads: This command is only available in threads!
commands.cannot_be_used_here: This command cannot be used here!

invite.no_permission: I do not have the correct permission to create invites in %s!

reminders.no_description: You need to provide a description for the reminder!
reminders.description_too_long: Your description is too long! Please keep it under %d characters.
reminders.invalid_time_format: I could not parse that date/time format, please try again!
reminders.time_in_past: You cannot set a reminder in the past!
reminders.save_error: An error occurred while saving that reminder! Please try again!
reminders.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting that reminder! Please try again!
reminders.no_reminders: You do not have any reminders set!
reminders.delete_reminder: You can delete reminders with `/remind delete <uuid>`
reminders.reminder_not_found: I could not find a reminder with that UUID!
reminders.reminder_set: I will remind you at %s about:

lock.no_permission: I do not have the correct permission to lock %s!

config.read_error: An error occurred while reading the config file! Please check the logs for more information.
config.invalid_value: Could not find given key `%s` in the config file!

user.username_not_found: Could not find player with username `%s`! (%s)

flared.no_tag: I could not find a tag with the name `%s`!
flared.tagged: %s applied the %s tag and locked this suggestion!

transfer_tag.invalid_tags: You have entered invalid from/to tags, please try again!
transfer_tag.no_threads_found: No threads were found with the tag %s!

request_review.not_suggestion_channel: You cannot send threads in non-suggestion channels for review!
request_review.too_soon: You cannot request another review on this thread yet!
request_review.not_own_thread: You cannot request a review on a thread you did not create!
request_review.already_greenlit: You can only request reviews on threads that are not greenlit!
request_review.not_enough_reactions: You need at least %d agrees to request a review!
request_review.bad_reaction_ratio: You need at least a %d%% agree ratio to request a review!
request_review.too_new: This suggestion is too new to request a review!
request_review.success: This suggestion has been sent for review!

role.invalid_role: Could not find a role with ID `%s`!
role.removed_role: Removed role %s from you! Use the same command to add it back.
role.added_role: Added role %s to you! Use the same command to remove it.
